headline: N/A
abstract:
The former forest stand was a coppice with standards dominated by beech (Fagus sylvatica L.) and oak (Quercus sessiliflora Smith), and was clear-cut in 1976. After windrowing, the site was planted with monospecific plots.
2 bloks and 9 plots (0.10ha) per block:beech (Fagus silvatica L.), oak, (Quercus sessiliflora Smith), Norway spruce (Picea abies Karst), Douglas fir (Pseudotsuga menziesii Franco), Corsican pine (Pinus nigra Arn. ssp. Laricio Poiret var. corsicana Hyl.) and Nordmann fir (Abies Nordmanniana Spach). Control and limed plots for coniferous. Permanent equipments were installed in each plot in 2001. Since that time monitoring occured for: 
Climate:  
Rainfall, Temperature, potential evapotranspiration: 1 station + 2 pluviometers 
Soil temperature and soil moisture: 4 profiles (15cm, 30cm, 60cm) for Beech, Oak, Douglas, Spruce plots of block 1 (continuous measurements) 
Vegetation: 
Tree diameters at breath height(annual measurements) 
Nutrition status, foliar analyses (annual measurements) 
Litterfall, 5 litter traps per plot; monthly collection (2000-2005). Determination: dry matter and major element contents
Biomass-mineralmass: determination of major element pools in above-ground tree organs for each plot (2001)
Soil: 
Description: sampling 1 pit described/plot ; 16 soil profiles sampled  per plot  (2001)
Soil determination: particle size distribution, bulk density, pH, CEC, P, C, N contents, total and trace elements, oxydes, soil mineralogy... 
Forest floor determination: dry matter and element contents (major and trace)
Throughfall, stemflow and soil solutions:
Throughfall and stemflow: 2 replicates per plot of block 1.
Soil solutions: Porous cup lysimeters, 5 profiles (15cm, 30cm, 60cm) per plot of block 1 (monthly collection); zero tension plate lysimeters, 2 replicates at 5cm depth per plot of block 1 (monthly collection).
Determination: element contents (major and trace)
author: Frédérique LOUAULT
name: SOERE F-ORE-T : Breuil-Chenue Site
distributionInfo: Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services
